## R Markdown


```{r cars}
data <- read.csv("Marriage_Licence_Statistics_Data.csv")

#Remove the unwanted column
data_clean <- data[ , ! names(data) %in% c("UOM_ID", "SYMBOL")]


```

## Including Plots

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
#Graph Data
ggplot(data_clean, aes(y = MARRIAGE_LICENSES, x = TIME_PERIOD))+geom_point()
```
